tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SavingsPlanTransactions (
  transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX user_id_idx (user_id),
  INDEX transaction_date_idx (transaction_date)
);

CREATE TABLE SavingsPlanTransactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_id INT,
    account_id INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    INDEX idx_plan_id (plan_id),
    INDEX idx_account_id (account_id, transaction_date)
);

CREATE TABLE SavingsPlanAccounts (
    account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_name VARCHAR(50),
    open_date DATE,
    balance DECIMAL,
    INDEX idx_account_name (account_name),
    INDEX idx_open_date (open_date)
);

CREATE TABLE SavingsPlanDetails (
    savings_plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    savings_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Savings_Plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    plan_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Savings_Plans (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_name VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Plan_Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_id INT,
  transaction_date DATE,
  transaction_amount DECIMAL,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (plan_id) REFERENCES Savings_Plans(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transaction_Logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_id INT,
  log_date TIMESTAMP,
  log_details TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Plan_Transactions(transaction_id)
);
